text: Dirk Bernard Joseph (Dick) Schouten (25 January 1923 - 3 February 2018) was a Dutch economist. He served as Professor of General Economics and Economic History at Tilburg University. He was known for his work in macroeconomic modelling.Arnold Boot at tilburguniversity.edu. 24 October 2012. Accessed September 14, 2013. Schouten was elected a member of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences in 1975. Schouten died on 3 February 2018 in The Hague at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch academics Category:Dutch economists Category:Writers from Frankfurt
title: Dirk Bernard Joseph Schouten
